title: Extinction is forever!
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Kerry Aulsbrook, an Education Officer specializing in natural history at the Museum of Victoria introduces Australian customs regulations prohibiting imports of animals and natural products. Examines the threats faced by species now close to extinction because of human interference.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer and Victoria. Ministry of Education
